COMMITTEE ON THE JUDICIARY
April l4, 1967
Mr. Myron M. Curry
Director, KFJM & CCTV
The University of North Dakota
Grand Forks, North Dakota 58201
Dear Mr. Curry:
Because of the interest you have expressed in the
educational radio provisions of S. Il60, I wanted
you to know that Thursday I expressed my support
for this legislation to the subcommittee which is
holding hearings on this bill. I am enclosing for
your study a copy of the statement I presented to
the Senate Communications Subcommittee in support
of Senator Magnuson’s bill authorizing funds for
educational radio and television.
It is my hope that North Dakota will significantly
benefit from expanded public broadcast facilities,
and I hope that Congress will take speedy action in
approving this legislation. If you have any ques¬
tions concerning it, feel free to call on me.
With kind regards, I am
Quentin N. Burdick
